data: The note API Integration Spec describes REST API integration points for the payment gateway.
The note API Integration Spec lists three API endpoints: POST /payments, GET /payments/{id}, and PATCH /payments/{id}.
The note API Integration Spec specifies OAuth2 with client credentials grant as the authentication method.
The note API Integration Spec outlines API request and response formats for the payment gateway.
The note API Integration Spec addresses business requirements for secure and standardized payment processing integrations.
The note API Integration Spec serves as a reference document for development teams implementing payment gateway integration.
